segments.text: I observe the woman at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolute, almost meditative, on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the deluge of water flowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in a growing puddle, yet her expression remains perfectly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's baffling how someone can be so utterly unaware of their immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, a boy is on a dangerously unstable stool, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is also involved, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does she ever look up from her dishwashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the garden through the window sharply contrasts with the chaos within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of sadness for her impending realization.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's about to discover a wet floor and a missing cookie stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her serene ignorance is almost comical, but also a bit tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of absorption is quite profound, if ill-timed.
segments.speaker: PAR
